author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...GABRIELLE NOW A CATEGORY 4 HURRICANE... ...INTERESTS IN THE AZORES SHOULD MONITOR...
summary: ...GABRIELLE NOW A CATEGORY 4 HURRICANE... ...INTERESTS IN THE AZORES SHOULD MONITOR... As of 5:00 PM AST Mon Sep 22 the center of Gabrielle was located near 31.7, -61.8 with movement NNE at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 948 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 140 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...GABRIELLE NOW A CATEGORY 4 HURRICANE... ...INTERESTS IN THE AZORES SHOULD MONITOR... As of 5:00 PM AST Mon Sep 22 the center of Gabrielle was located near 31.7, -61.8 with movement NNE at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 948 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 140 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Gabrielle (AT2/AL072025)
